duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide direct patient care in a medical-surgical environment, ensuring the delivery of high-quality and compassionate care.
Utilize critical thinking and problem-solving skills to assess and intervene in emergency medical situations.
Operate medical equipment and monitor patient conditions, ensuring accurate and timely responses to changes in health status.
Adhere to healthcare regulations and best practices, maintaining compliance with patient safety and quality standards.
Demonstrate compassion and empathy in patient interactions, offering emotional support and comfort during difficult times.
Manage time effectively, prioritizing patient care tasks and maintaining efficient workflow in a fast-paced healthcare setting.
